CHANGELOG
=========

1.0.2 (2020-10-16)
------------------

* Refactored unit test to use pytest
* Updated documentation and README

------------------

* Fixed get_state, where the capitalier is a function and is now executed

1.0.0 (2018-05-29)
------------------

* Cherry pick mixins from anyblok-core
* Add SchemaValidator method
* Add basic mixins
